aspects.description: Overall frontend design and styling is applied
judgementScoreDescription: No styling applied at all or basic browser styling only
Basic styling is applied and content is readable, but some elements have default browser styling
Good styling is applied throughout with no default browser elements and content is well readable
Advanced styling with visually appealing and cohesive design, creative use of typography, colors, spacing to enhance user experience

aspects.description: Login page is well structured and user-friendly
judgementScoreDescription: Login page is not implemented or poorly styled
Basic login page with minimal styling
Well-styled login page with clear structure and good user experience
Exceptional login page design with advanced styling and intuitive user interface

aspects.description: Restaurant browsing page is well structured and clear
judgementScoreDescription: Page feels empty or overloaded, lacking clear structure
Basic structure with readable content but minimal styling
Well-structured page with good organization and clear navigation
Exceptional structure with advanced styling, intuitive navigation and professional appearance

aspects.description: Restaurant detail page with menu is well structured
judgementScoreDescription: Page feels empty or overloaded, difficult to navigate menu items
Basic structure showing menu items but minimal styling
Well-structured page with clear menu display and good organization
Exceptional menu page with advanced styling and excellent user experience

aspects.extraDescription: Users can log in with email and password, JWT token is stored and used for subsequent requests
New users can register with name, email, password and password confirmation with proper validation
Users can log out, JWT token is cleared, and user is redirected to login page
JWT token is stored in browser storage and persists across page reloads
Homepage displays 6 randomly selected restaurants with name, description, average rating and Continue link
Show more results link displays remaining restaurants when clicked
Search bar filters restaurants based on query string and displays results
Restaurants that user has previously ordered from display with purple border
Restaurant page displays menu items with name, price, and quantity selector
Add to cart button adds menu items to cart with quantity of 1
Orders are retained when browser is reloaded

aspects.description: Finish Order page displays cart summary
aspects.extraDescription: Cart summary shows all items with quantities, individual prices, and total amount
Users can remove items from cart in Finish Order page
After confirming order, user receives an on-screen confirmation message
Users can submit reviews with star rating (1-5) and comment text
Past reviews are fetched and displayed with reviewer name, rating, and comment
Proper input validation for email format, password matching, and error feedback for failed operations
Backend API errors are handled gracefully with user-friendly error messages
Application is built as SPA with proper client-side routing between pages
Modern JavaScript framework (React, Vue, Angular) is used appropriately with component structure
